name: polkadapt
author: Polkascan Foundation <info@polkascan.org>
description: A pluggable framework for heterogeneous data retrieval and augmentation.

scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run symlink
scripts.build-core: cd projects/core && npm install && npm update && cd .. && ng build --configuration production core
scripts.build-substrate-rpc: cd projects/substrate-rpc && npm install && npm update && cd .. && ng build --configuration production substrate-rpc
scripts.build-polkascan: cd projects/polkascan && npm install && npm update && cd .. && ng build --configuration production polkascan
scripts.build-coingecko: cd projects/coingecko && npm install && npm update && cd .. && ng build --configuration production coingecko
scripts.build: npm run build-core && concurrently "npm run build-substrate-rpc" "npm run build-polkascan" "npm run build-coingecko"
scripts.watch: ng build core --configuration development && concurrently "ng build substrate-rpc --watch --configuration development" "ng build polkascan --watch --configuration development" "ng build coingecko --watch --configuration development" "sleep 20 && ng build core --watch --configuration development"
